apps.name: forScore
apps.subtitle: Sheet music reader v14.3.4
apps.description: A powerful sheet music reader for iOS with annotation and organization features.
apps.localizedDescription:
forScore v14.3.4
- A powerful paid sheet music reader for iOS.
- Features: Annotate, organize, and share sheet music.
- Pro unlocked, decrypted IPA. Usually $25 - Free
apps.title: forScore

apps.name: iZip Pro
apps.subtitle: File compression tool v20.60
apps.description: A file compression and decompression tool for iOS with pro features unlocked.
apps.localizedDescription:
iZip Pro v20.60
- A file compression and decompression tool for iOS.
- Features: Unzip and zip files, support for multiple formats.
- Pro features unlocked.
apps.title: iZip Pro

apps.name: Truecaller
apps.subtitle: Caller ID with Gold Unlocked v14.6
apps.description: Identify unknown callers and block spam with Gold Unlocked features.
apps.localizedDescription:
Truecaller: Number & Caller ID v14.6
- Identify unknown callers and block spam.
- Modifier: Gold Unlocked.
- Note: Requires iOS 16.0 or later.

Tweaked by @blatants
apps.title: Truecaller

apps.name: HD Flix

HD Flix No Ads

apps.title: HD Flix
